title: Binlogs redacting - next iterations
body:
### Context
#8400 


### Next goals
- [x] Add documentation of the feature to binlog viewer repo and the web page
- [ ] Add more stats to the binlogtool/ redactor CLI - and collect those in arcade telementry (type of data redacted and their counts + hashes, perf counts)
- [ ] Add more patterns: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/9294#issuecomment-1803678043
- [ ] Possibly extend the adoption in arcade: https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/issues/14222
